name: My Selfie Story
description:
My Selfie Story

My Selfie Story is an amazing game from Studio Mobile!Sophie is a young and good-looking girl that loves luxury cars, expensive bars and easy living. Deep inside she dreams of becoming famous and you're the one that can help her wishes come true! Get as much "likes" as you can in Selfiegram social network, gain more followers to be rewarded with Sophie's hot new photos afterwards!

My Selfie Story has:
  • Simple yet addictive gameplay. Collect various "like" combos as fast as you can or as much as you can; hold new records – do everything you can to make Sophie famous!
  • Impressive graphics. Juicy hi-definition art will set the perfect mood for the story; can you unlock every selfie in the game?
  • You can compete with your friends, help the less fortunate and share your best moments with your Twitter, Instagram VK and Facebook followers and friends.
  • A story that will never end. The game has more than 100 levels – and it's just a start. Stay tuned for the hottest updates that are soon to follow!
